changeSet.sql: insert into krcr_parm_t (NMSPC_CD,CMPNT_CD,PARM_NM, OBJ_ID, PARM_TYP_CD, VAL, PARM_DESC_TXT, EVAL_OPRTR_CD, APPL_ID) values ('KFS-PURAP', 'ElectronicInvoiceStep', 'DEFAULT_PROCESSING_CAMPUS', sys_guid(), 'CONFG', 'IT', 'This parameter is to determine the campus for electronic invoice payments. If parameter value is populated, set the processing campus on the eInvoice generated PREQ to the parameter value if initiator''s campus is missing and OVERRIDE is not set up. ', 'D', 'KFS') /

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO KRCR_CMPNT_T (NMSPC_CD, CMPNT_CD, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, NM, ACTV_IND) VALUES ('CONFAGREE', 'All', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'All', 'Y') / INSERT INTO KRCR_PARM_T (NMSPC_CD, CMPNT_CD, PARM_NM, APPL_ID, OBJ_ID, VER_NBR, PARM_TYP_CD, VAL, PARM_DESC_TXT, EVAL_OPRTR_CD) VALUES ('CONFAGREE', 'All', 'CONF_AGREEMENT_DOCLINK_CUTOFF', 'confagree', SYS_GUID(), 1, 'CONFG', (SELECT MAX(DOC_HDR_ID) FROM KREW_DOC_HDR_T WHERE CRTE_DT = (SELECT MAX(CRTE_DT) FROM KREW_DOC_HDR_T)), 'The document number representing the cutoff point at which pending Conf Agreement docs are regarded as being created after the Rice 2.x conversion of Cynergy.', 'A') /
